message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_STATUS
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, is not 'Active', it cannot be associated to the provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_END_DATE
message.locale: The service offering, %1s, has already ended, it cannot be associated to the provider.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_SERVICE_START_DATE
message.locale: The provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the service offering Start Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_AFTER_PROVIDER_START_DATE
message.locale: The provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider Enrollment Date, %2d.
The provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or after the provider Enrolment Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_SERVICE_END_DATE
message.locale: The provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the service offering End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_START_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_PROVIDER_END_DATE
message.locale: The provider service Start Date, %1d, must be on or before the provider End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_END_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_SERVICE_END_DATE
message.locale: The provider service End Date, %1d, must be on or before the service offering End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_END_DATE_MUST_BE_ON_OR_BEFORE_PROVIDER_END_DATE
message.locale: The provider service End Date, %1d, must be on or before the provider End Date, %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XFV_END_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The End Reason must be entered if the End Date is entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XFV_MUST_NOT_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The End Reason must not be entered if the End Date is not entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_PROVIDER_SERVICE_DELETED_CANNOT_BE_MODIFIED
message.locale: The provider service has already been deleted, it cannot be modified.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_SERVICE_OFFERING_DUPLICATE_ENTRY
message.locale: This service offering, %1s, already exists for this provider.

message.name: INF_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_APPROVALCRITERION_ACCREDITATION_NOT_VALID
message.locale: This provider does not have an accreditation valid for the current date.

message.name: INF_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_APPROVALCRITERION_BACKGROUND_CHECKS_NOT_PASSED
message.locale: The following provider member(s) %1s, do not have background checks with result as "Pass" valid as on current date.

message.name: INF_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_APPROVALCRITERION_HOME_STUDIES_NOT_APPROVED
message.locale: The following home studies %1s, are not 'Approved'.

message.name: INF_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_APPROVALCRITERION_LICENSE_NOT_VALID
message.locale: This provider does not have a license valid for the current date.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_FV_DENIAL_REASON_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: The Denial Reason must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_RV_ALREADY_APPROVED
message.locale: This provider service has already been 'Approved'.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_RV__APPROVE_ONLY_PENDING_APPROVAL
message.locale: The provider service with a status of 'Pending Approval' can only be approved.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_PROVIDER_SERVICE_CANNOT_DELETE_AGAIN
message.locale: The provider service has already been deleted.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_RV__DENY_ONLY_PENDING_APPROVAL
message.locale: The provider service with a status of 'Pending Approval' can only be denied.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_SERVICE_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE_AND_ENDDATE
message.locale: This service offering, %1s, already exists for this provider from %2d to %3d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_CANNOT_CREATE_SERVICE_ALREADY_EXISTS_WITH_STARTDATE
message.locale: This service offering, %1s, already exists for this provider from %2d.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_FV_SERVICE_MUST_BE_ENTERED
message.locale: 'Service' must be entered.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_RV_CAN_NOT_BE_APPROVED
message.locale: This provider service is '%1c', it cannot be approved.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_RV_CAN_NOT_BE_DENIED
message.locale: This provider service has been deleted, it cannot be denied approval.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_APPROVED_RV_CAN_NOT_BE_DENIED
message.locale: This provider service has been 'Approved', it cannot be denied approval.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_RV_CAN_NOT_BE_DELETED
message.locale: This provider service is '%1c', it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_OFFERING_CANNOT_BE_EDITED_INSIDE_CONTRACT
message.locale: This provider offering, %1s, is included in a contract, it cannot be modified here.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_OFFERING_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED_INSIDE_CONTRACT
message.locale: This provider offering, %1s, is included in a contract, it cannot be deleted here.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_OFFERING_CANNOT_BE_APPROVED_WITHOUT_ACTIVE_LICENSE
message.locale: This provider does not have a license valid for the current date.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_OFFERING_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED_IF_PLACEMENT_EXISTING
message.locale: This provider offering, %1s, is used for a client placement, it cannot be deleted.

message.name: ERR_PROVIDEROFFERING_XRV_OFFERING_CANNOT_BE_CANCELLED_AS_ROSTER_EXISTS
message.locale: The provider service, %1s, is included on a roster, it cannot be deleted.
